slides.title: Track growth
slides.text: See how much you’ve improved with before and after pictures of yourself as you smash your hair goals.

slides.title: Bespoke regimen
slides.text: Answer a couple of questions about your hair and we’d recommend the right regimen for fabulous results.

slides.title: Routine alerts
slides.text: With regular push notifications on your phone, there’s no way you would forget to wash your hair again.
